project_plan.name: Weather Information CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the functionality to fetch weather data from a public API for a given city
Parse the fetched data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the CLI interface to accept user input for the city name
Display the fetched weather information (temperature, humidity, and conditions) in the terminal
Write tests for the weather data fetching and parsing functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
